title: AI Response Received
description: Fired when the AI generates and returns a response.

conversationId.description: Unique identifier for the conversation session.

messageId.description: Unique identifier for the response message.

model.description: The AI model that generated the response.

provider.description: The AI provider or vendor that generated the response.

latencyMs.description: Time in milliseconds from request to first or complete response.

promptTokens.description: Number of tokens in the input prompt.

completionTokens.description: Number of tokens in the generated response.

finishReason.description: The reason the AI stopped generating the response.

isStreaming.description: Whether the response was delivered via streaming.

toolsUsed.description: Tools or functions the AI invoked while generating the response.

contentLength.description: The length of the response content in characters.
